<title level="1" right="Trait">[Boggard](/Traits.aspx?ID=743)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 361 <sup>1.1</sup>

Boggards are frog-like humanoids. They typically have darkvision.
name: Boggard
